name: team-radio-shared
description: Team radio shared modules that can be used for both server & client side.

scripts.update: npm run update:server && npm run update:client
scripts.update:client: cd ../client && npm un team-radio-shared && npm i team-radio-shared
scripts.update:server: cd ../server && npm un team-radio-shared && npm i team-radio-shared

author: @pvtri96
